title: The mycobacterium lipid transporter MmpL3 is dimeric in detergent solution, SMALPs and reconstituted nanodiscs
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, 5,901-913
DOI: 10.1039/D4CB00110A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sara Cioccolo, Joseph D. Barritt, Naomi Pollock, Zoe Hall, Julia Babuta, Pooja Sridhar, Alicia Just, Nina Morgner, Tim Dafforn, Ian Gould, Bernadette Byrne
MmpL3 is an essential mycobacterial transporter. Extensive biophysical analysis reveals for the first time that MmpL3 exists as a dimer in different membrane mimetics.
